index.html.title: Welcome to your new reference documentation
index.html.keywords: Welcome to your new reference documentation This is the landing page for your generated reference documentation. You can use the navigation bar at the top and the table of contents to the left to navigate your documentation. You can change this content by editing the index.md file found in <outputfolder>/reference/index.md.
